verses.verse: Now the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Jonah <S%H3124><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amittai, <S%H573><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Nineveh, <S%H5210><s%> that great <S%H1419><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> and cry <S%H7121><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it; for <S%H3588><s%> their wickedness <S%H7451><s%> is come up <S%H5927><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me.

But Jonah <S%H3124><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> to flee <S%H1272><s%> unto Tarshish <S%H8659><s%> from the presence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and went down <S%H3381><s%> to Joppa; <S%H3305><s%> and he found <S%H4672><s%> a ship <S%H591><s%> going <S%H935><s%> to Tarshish: <S%H8659><s%> so he paid <S%H5414><s%> the fare <S%H7939><s%> thereof, and went down <S%H3381><s%> into it, to go <S%H935><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> them unto Tarshish <S%H8659><s%> from the presence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

But the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sent out <S%H2904><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and there was <S%H1961><s%> a mighty <S%H1419><s%> tempest <S%H5591><s%> in the sea, <S%H3220><s%> so that the ship <S%H591><s%> was like <S%H2803><s%> to be broken. <S%H7665><s%>

Then the mariners <S%H4419><s%> were afraid, <S%H3372><s%> and cried <S%H2199><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his god, <S%H430><s%> and cast forth <S%H2904><s%> <S%H853><s%> the wares <S%H3627><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were in the ship <S%H591><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> to lighten <S%H7043><s%> it of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> them. But Jonah <S%H3124><s%> was gone down <S%H3381><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the sides <S%H3411><s%> of the ship; <S%H5600><s%> and he lay, <S%H7901><s%> and was fast asleep. <S%H7290><s%>

So the shipmaster <S%H7227><s%> <S%H2259><s%> came <S%H7126><s%> to <S%H413><s%> him, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, What <S%H4100><s%> meanest thou, O sleeper? <S%H7290><s%> arise, <S%H6965><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> if so be <S%H194><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> will think <S%H6245><s%> upon us, that we perish <S%H6><s%> not. <S%H3808><s%>

And they said <S%H559><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> to <S%H413><s%> his fellow, <S%H7453><s%> Come, <S%H1980><s%> and let us cast <S%H5307><s%> lots, <S%H1486><s%> that we may know <S%H3045><s%> for whose cause <S%H7945><s%> <S%H4310><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> is upon us. So they cast <S%H5307><s%> lots, <S%H1486><s%> and the lot <S%H1486><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> Jonah. <S%H3124><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> they unto <S%H413><s%> him, Tell <S%H5046><s%> us, we pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> for whose cause <S%H834><s%> <S%H4310><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> is upon us; What <S%H4100><s%> is thine occupation? <S%H4399><s%> and whence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H370><s%> comest <S%H935><s%> thou? what <S%H4100><s%> is thy country? <S%H776><s%> and of what <S%H335><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> art thou? <S%H859><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, I <S%H595><s%> am a Hebrew; <S%H5680><s%> and I <S%H589><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> which <S%H834><s%> hath made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> and the dry <S%H3004><s%> land.

Then were the men <S%H376><s%> exceedingly <S%H1419><s%> afraid, <S%H3372><s%> <S%H3374><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Why <S%H4100><s%> hast thou done <S%H6213><s%> this? <S%H2063><s%> For <S%H3588><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> fled <S%H1272><s%> from the presence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he had told <S%H5046><s%> them.

Then said <S%H559><s%> they unto <S%H413><s%> him, What <S%H4100><s%> shall we do <S%H6213><s%> unto thee, that the sea <S%H3220><s%> may be calm <S%H8367><s%> unto <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> us? for <S%H3588><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> wrought, <S%H1980><s%> and was tempestuous. <S%H5590><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Take me up, <S%H5375><s%> and cast me forth <S%H2904><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the sea; <S%H3220><s%> so shall the sea <S%H3220><s%> be calm <S%H8367><s%> unto <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> you: for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> for my sake <S%H7945><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> tempest <S%H5591><s%> is upon <S%H5921><s%> you.

Nevertheless the men <S%H376><s%> rowed <S%H2864><s%> hard to bring <S%H7725><s%> it to <S%H413><s%> the land; <S%H3004><s%> but they could <S%H3201><s%> not: <S%H3808><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> wrought, <S%H1980><s%> and was tempestuous <S%H5590><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them.

Wherefore they cried <S%H7121><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> We beseech thee, <S%H4994><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> we beseech thee, <S%H577><s%> let us not <S%H408><s%> perish <S%H6><s%> for this <S%H2088><s%> man's <S%H376><s%> life, <S%H5315><s%> and lay <S%H5414><s%> not <S%H408><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> us innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood: <S%H1818><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> hast done <S%H6213><s%> as <S%H834><s%> it pleased <S%H2654><s%> thee.

So they took up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jonah, <S%H3124><s%> and cast him forth <S%H2904><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the sea: <S%H3220><s%> and the sea <S%H3220><s%> ceased <S%H5975><s%> from her raging. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2197><s%>

Then the men <S%H376><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> <S%H3374><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> exceedingly, <S%H1419><s%> and offered <S%H2076><s%> a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and made <S%H5087><s%> vows. <S%H5088><s%>

Now the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had prepared <S%H4487><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> fish <S%H1709><s%> to swallow up <S%H1104><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jonah. <S%H3124><s%> And Jonah <S%H3124><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> in the belly <S%H4578><s%> of the fish <S%H1709><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> nights. <S%H3915><s%>
